Translations.Text: Whoever obe messenger obe DI! As por those turn ni ne send vi their guardian
Ili pledge obedience ili las vi kelk da them haven intentions contrary al ki ili dir! DI records their innermost intentions Vi disregard them put your fid DI! DI suffices ADVOKAT
Why ili ne stud Quran carefully Se est el ali than DI ili trov gxi numerous contradictions

When fam afekt security ven their voj ili stern gxi. Hav ili referred gxi messenger those en charge them those kompren these materi inform them! Se gxi est por di grace vi His mercy vi sekv diabl a few
Vi batal ig DI; vi est responsible nur your own anim exhort believers do des sam DI testament neutralize POTENC DE those disbelieve! DI est mult powerful mult effective
Whoever mediates bon deed ricev akci kredit thereof whoever mediates evil work incurs akci thereof! DI controls all AJX
When greeted greeting vi respond bon greeting je malplej egal 1! DI reckons all AJX
